snippet: The Southeast Asian country, which has gradually embraced reintegration with the world, became the 191st country to sign the agreement.
abstract: Myanmar becomes 191st country to sign onto Chemical Weapons Convention, treaty that bans chemical weapons use.
lead_paragraph: The Southeast Asian country, which has gradually embraced reintegration with the world, became the 191st country to sign the agreement.

headline.main: Myanmar Signs Treaty on Chemical Weapons

keywords.value: Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons
